mapper.select: SELECT p.*, c.name as category_name FROM product p LEFT JOIN category c ON p.category_id = c.id WHERE p.status = 1 AND p.category_id = #{categoryId} AND p.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY p.id ASC

SELECT p.*, c.name as category_name FROM product p LEFT JOIN category c ON p.category_id = c.id WHERE 1=1 AND p.category_id = #{categoryId} AND p.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY p.id ASC
SELECT p.*, c.name as category_name FROM product p LEFT JOIN category c ON p.category_id = c.id WHERE p.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (name, description, price, stock, image_url, category_id, status) VALUES (#{name}, #{description}, #{price}, #{stock}, #{imageUrl}, #{categoryId}, #{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET name=#{name}, description=#{description}, price=#{price}, stock=#{stock}, image_url=#{imageUrl}, category_id=#{categoryId}, status=#{status} WHERE id=#{id}
UPDATE product SET stock = stock - #{quantity} WHERE id = #{id} AND stock >= #{quantity}
